metadata.title: CVE-2019-9233 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In wpa_supplicant_8, there is a possible out of bounds read due to anincorrect bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosurewith no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is notneeded for exploitation. Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10Android ID:A-122529021

criterions.comment: wpa package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
